Kevin Hanssen, bụ onye Zimbabwe na-eme ihe nkiri, onye edemede na onye egwu. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Mind Games, Mugabe na The Telling Room

N'afọ 1994, o nwetara nzere Bachelor of Arts na Industrial Psychology na UNISA, South Africa. Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere Over the Edge Theatre Company. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na egwuregwu 'A Man Like You' nke e mere n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ihe nkiri Zimbabwe.
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite n'ọtụtụ ememme mba ụwa.
